title: Living Language Ultimate German II.pdf
description:
Ultimate German II Advanced
Ultimate German Advanced: A Complete Lesson Book and Reference Guide
A Complete Lesson Book and Reference Guide


Developed by the experts at Living Language, this book offers a highly effective combination of advanced conversational German with grammar and culture. This sequel to the Basic-Intermediate Ultimate German book covers the equivalent of two years of college-level study.

20 lessons, each with a lively, authentic German dialogue that takes you everywhere from a vineyard to a film festival to a lawyer's office.
English translations and explanations of German grammar and usage, pronunciation, vocabulary, and cultural notes.
Special sections on business vocabulary and etiquette.
Quizzes and review sections to check your progress.
A complete summary of German grammar, and verb charts covering all major tenses.
A section on letter writing for business and social occasions.
An extensive two-way glossary.

For serious language learners, students, businesspeople. Uses up to date conversations and vocabulary in each lesson and teaches grammar, reading, writing and culture along with conversational skills. A comprehensive programme - equivalent to two years of college level study.

Language Course : Book Format : PDF Quality : Scanned pages Number of pages : 428 Audio Format : MP3

Audio in separate torrent
